text: I usually have good pizza and delivery service...tonight when I ordered they told me about 45 minutes...it took 1 HOUR & 20 MINUTES it was COLD & the cheese was stuck to the top of the box...very DISAPPOINTED with their pizza & service...I guess I will have to find another place that will deliver!!! üëéüëéüëéüëéüëé
